# promise/spec-only <Badge type="info" text="Restriction" />

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Disallow use of non-standard Promise static methods.

### Why is this bad?

Non-standard Promises may cost more maintenance work.

### Examples

Examples of **incorrect** code for this rule:

```js
Promise.done();
```

Examples of **correct** code for this rule:

```js
Promise.resolve();
```

## References

- [Rule Source](https://github.com/oxc-project/oxc/blob/25ddb3519289dfe2a51e53b9b0c355d8ad950bbc/crates/oxc_linter/src/rules/promise/spec_only.rs)
